title: SAMEER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 23 Project Technician and Other Posts
description: The Society for Applied Microwave Electronics Engineering and Research (SAMEER) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of Research Scientist, Project Assistant - A, and Project Technician -A Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, Diploma in Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, M.Sc., and ITI can apply for the SAMEER R...
